class openzwave.scene.ZWaveScene(scene_id, network=None)

Represents a single scene within the Z-Wave Network

activate()

Activate the zwave scene.

add_value(value_id, value_data)

Add a value to the zwave scene.

create(name)

Create a new zwave scene and update the object_id field

label

The label of the scene.

set_value(value_id, value_data)

Set a value to the zwave scene.

Parameters:
  • value_id (int) – ID of the value
  • network (ZWaveNetwork) – The network object to access the manager
values

The values used in the scene.
